ygData.subject: RE: Newbie Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. Good question - I will be interested in knowing more my self ┬á 2. www.harpers.net/bard  ┬á & tallies site
ygData.messageBody:
1. Good question - I will be interested in knowing more my self
´┐¢
2. www.harpers.net/bard <http://www.harpers.net/bard> ´┐¢ & tallies site
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
<http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm>
´┐¢
3.´┐¢ You're doing what am doing - I got ISDN and fastest PC you can buy - and
I think maybe if i am lucky and dont get stunned I can get 3 going.´┐¢ But 2
for me - even 2 with screen icons is hard enough.´┐¢ John Kim is the only one
I know that has reported 4 songs - but that's a huge achievement - he must
be well out of melee combat when he does.´┐¢ I think 3 would be great but am
pretty happy if i can do 2 and remeber to equip my weps.
´┐¢
4. 2HS and 2HB capped at 1 - left over from beta when they had it but felt
we needed to be nerfed - or some such.
´┐¢
Others reading this - please set me straight if i am misspeaking on these
issues.
´┐¢
Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: Christine [mailto:christine@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 7:53 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Newbie Questions


Hi everyone, I'm an experienced player, but a newbie bard. I've been waiting
a long time to ask these questions, hoping they would answer themselves on
the list, but I'm still curious! (The list has of course answered MANY other
questions I had.) The FAQ that was sent to the list earlier is really good,
and answered a lot of things I was wondering about, perhaps these questions
could be added to it. And yes, I looked in the archives, but they seem
almost impossible to search.
´┐¢
Anyway, here goes. Sorry if these have been gone over already to death. :P
´┐¢
1. What are a bard's more important stats for playing songs? I've heard
Charisma is important - does it make it so the songs are more potent or so
that they are resisted less?
´┐¢
2. What is a good bard website?
´┐¢
3. What is the best way to cycle songs? Basically what I'm doing now is
making a panel of hotkeys, then hitting 1 to start song, 1 again to stop, 2
to start second song, 2 to stop, etc. But I kind of got the impression from
the list that using´┐¢ a /stop hotkey might be faster? (It is almost
impossible for more to cycle three songs.)
´┐¢
4. Is it true bard 2h slash skill is capped at 1 (or something like that?)
´┐¢
Hmmm I guess that is it for now.
´┐¢
Thanks in advance! :)
´┐¢
Daleia
10 Bard, Bristlebane
